abstract: The Barcelona-born Cristian Zuzunaga trained as a type designer, and his love for letterpress squares evolved into a fixation on the pixel, "the icon of our time."
snippet: The Barcelona-born Cristian Zuzunaga trained as a type designer, and his love for letterpress squares evolved into a fixation on the pixel, "the icon of our time."

headline.main: Styled to a T | Cristian Zuzunaga
